div.p:
CARMINA GRATULATORIA
Strasbourg, A. Bertram, 1584.
FRIDERICO DOCANDROLandauiensi, HONESTO CVM
PRIMIS ET ERVDITO IV- VENI, HONORES ET INSIGNIA MA¬
GISTERII, IN ACADEMIA REI- pub. Argentinensis laudatissi¬
ma, quinto die Nouemb. accipienti, à Decano specta¬
bili, D. Laurentio Tuppio, V. I. Doctore, Anno à saluatore
nato 1584. GRATVLANTVR AMICI. (Vignette).
ARGENTORATI Excudebat Antonius Bertramus. (Verso
blanc.)
In-40, car, ital, et grecs, 8 ff. non ch., sign. A-B, réclames, ini¬
tiales ornées; titre encadré, (ornaments.)
Poésies de M. Leonhard Hutterus, Petrus Friderus Mindensis,
Josephus Langius Caesarimontanus, Ioannes Michaël Beutherus Argen¬
tinâs, Hieronymus Treutlerus Suidnicensis Silesius, Christophorus Für¬
gang Olsnicensis, Ioannes Steurle Landauiensis, Ioachimus Crusius
Leorinus Silesius, Nicolaus Wallung Landensis, Paulus Crusius
Molendinus.
R102288(8). Prov.: Bibliothèque Ch. Schmidt, Strasbourg.
455
299
CARMINA GRATULATORIA
Strasbourg, A. Bertram, 1585.
Carmina Gratulatoria, Scripta ab amicis, IN HONO¬
REM] MELCHISEDECI PONTANI AVSTRII;] CVM EI SECVNDVS
PHILOSOPHIAE GRADVS,) in inclyta Argentoratensium Aca¬
demia, à M. HEN- NINGO OLDENDORPIO: Decano spectabili
decerneretur V. Cal. Nouemb. Anno salutis humanae
1585.
Marque typ. d’Ant. Bertram. (H C B, Planche XLIV, NO I,
Silvestre, No 1023.)
ARGENTORATI. Excudebat Antonius Bertramus. CIO.
ID. LXXXV. (Verso blanc.)
In-4e, car. ital., 6 ff. non ch, sign. A-B, réclames, initiales ornées.
Poésies de Wolfgangus Ernricus Iagenreuter in Pernau Austria¬
cus, Christophorus Leysserus in Idoltaberg Austrius, Helmhartus à Fri¬
deshaim Austrius, Erasmus Heckelbergerus Austrius, Michaël Händl
Austrius, Iodocus Iainger Austrius, Georgius Forstelius Austriacus,
Andreas Falckenbergerus Austrius, Ioannes Stenngl Austriacus, Paulus
Crusius Molendinus, Ludouicus Schmelzing, Hieronymus Treutlerus Sile¬
sius, Ioannes Christophorus Schilling Francosteinensis. Georgius Langius
Gorlicensis.
R 102.288(9). Prov. : Bibliothèque Ch. Schmidt, Strasbourg.
456
